name: Volition Anchor
text:
Target an enemy unit model in range.

Make a Fury attack roll against the target model. If this attack hits, it does no damage. Instead, the hit unit suffers â€“1 ARM. Additionally, friendly models can reroll attack rolls against affected models. An attack roll can be rerolled once as a result of Volition Anchor.

Volition Anchor expires at the end of the Pulse round.
